poketeball.desc: A ball you can use to catch Poketes

superball.desc: A ball you can use to catch Poketes with an increased chance

hyperball.desc: For catching Poketes with a waaay higher chance

treat.desc: Upgrades a Pokete by a whole level.

steini.name: Steini
steini.desc: A squared stone that can be readily found just lying around.

mowcow.name: Mowcow
mowcow.desc: A cow-like creature found in meadows.

bigstone.name: Bigstone
bigstone.desc: A big and heavy stone made from one of the hardest materials.

poundi.name: Poundi
poundi.desc: A powerful and heavy stone Pokete that lives in mountain caves.

lilstone.name: Lilstone
lilstone.desc: A small but powerful stone Pokete that lives in the mountains.

rosi.name: Rosi
rosi.desc: A plant Pokete that's often mistaken for a normal flower.

wheeto.name: Wheeto
wheeto.desc: A plant Pokete found in Agrawos; it has special 'Powers'.

saugh.name: Saugh
saugh.desc: The dark and fiery souls of those who got burned to death by the hot sun!

gobost.name: Gobost
gobost.desc: A scary ghost Pokete that lives in caves and old houses.

angrilo.name: Angrilo
angrilo.desc: A ghost Pokete that will scare your pants off.

vogli.name: Vogli
vogli.desc: A very common bird Pokete; it lives everywhere.

voglo.name: Voglo
voglo.desc: A very aggressive bird Pokete that can only be found in the woods.

voglus.name: Voglus
voglus.desc: A very aggressive and hard to find bird Pokete.

ostri.name: Ostri
ostri.desc: A very aggressive bird Pokete that lives near deserts; it will try to peck out your eyes.

karpi.name: Karpi
karpi.desc: A harmless water Pokete that can be found everywhere.

choka.name: Choka
choka.desc: A fucking dangerous and enormous snake Pokete.

treenator.name: Treenator
treenator.desc: A scary and dangerous apple tree.

blub.name: Blub
blub.desc: Very delicious and low fat water Pokete.

owol.name: Owol
owol.desc: A nocturnal Pokete that is looking for small children to eat as a midnight snack.

ratatat.name: Ratatat
ratatat.desc: A damn dangerous and enourmous rat; it will bite of your leg.

hornita.name: Hornita
hornita.desc: A majestic horse that is always looking for something to pick with its horn.

horny.name: Horny
horny.desc: A teenage unicorn in the middle of puberty.

bushy.name: Bushy
bushy.desc: A bush, and just a bush. But watch out!

wolfior.name: Wolfior
wolfior.desc: A fiery wolf straight from hell that likes to burn 11 years old butts off.

wolfiro.name: Wolfiro
wolfiro.desc: A fiery wolf from hell on steroids.

lindemon.name: Lindemon
lindemon.desc: An ancient dragon Pokete famous for destroying cities and villages.

rollator.name: Rollator
rollator.desc: A big chunk of stone and dirt that rolls around.

clampi.name: Clampi
clampi.desc: A shell that lives deep in the sea or near bays; it's pretty hard to crack.

crabbat.name: Crabbat
crabbat.desc: A crusty Pokete that loves to pinch big toes.

rustacean.name: Rustacean
rustacean.desc: A crusty Pokete that will pinch your toes and check whether or not you borrowed something.

electrode.name: Electrode
electrode.desc: A small floating ball that will give you a shock.

confuso.name: Confuso
confuso.desc: A ball floating around in dark woods and caves, that will confuse the shit out of you.

radishon.name: Radishon
radishon.desc: A small plant Pokete found burried in the ground.

radishuk.name: Radishuk
radishuk.desc: A small plant Pokete deeply burried in the ground.

radishull.name: Radishull
radishull.desc: A small plant Pokete found in the ground.

megapois.name: Megapois
megapois.desc: A not at all suspicious plant.

corcos_day.name: Corcos
corcos_day.desc: A small heavy thing that can be found on the ground; it may reveal something wonderful later.

corcos_night.name: Corcos
corcos_night.desc: A small heavy thing that can be found on the ground; it may reveal something wonderful later.

raupathor_day.name: Raupathor
raupathor_day.desc: A small caterpillar found on leaves.

raupathor_night.name: Raupathor
raupathor_night.desc: A small caterpillar found on leaves.

schmetterling.name: Schmetterling
schmetterling.desc: A butterfly that will schmetter you away.

mothor.name: Mothor
mothor.desc: A dark butterfly that will schmetter you away.

lil_nut.name: Lil Nut
lil_nut.desc: A very small whatever that sticks out of the ground.

dicki.name: Dicki
dicki.desc: A little whatever that sticks out of the ground.

dicko.name: Dicko
dicko.desc: An even bigger whatever that sticks out of the ground.

diamondos.name: Diamondos
diamondos.desc: A precious diamond that can only be found in the darkest caves.

bablbam.name: Bablbam
bablbam.desc: Dead or alive entity with slow movement and mental ability.

kakraholt.name: Kakraholt
kakraholt.desc: A terrestrial crab full of accumulated electrical energy.

uberpavous.name: Uberpavous
uberpavous.desc: Dangerous spider like Pokete with strong mandibles.

peachade.name: Peachade
peachade.desc: Sweat and juicy plant pokete thats' looks and thiccness will drive you crazy.

cry.name: Cry
cry.desc: So loud that it confuses the enemy.

bite.name: Bite
bite.desc: A hard bite with sharp teeth.

power_bite.name: Power Bite
power_bite.desc: The hardest bite you can think of.

chocer.name: Choker
chocer.desc: Chokes the enemy and makes it weaker.

meat_skewer.name: Meat Skewer
meat_skewer.desc: Drills a horn deep in the enemy's flesh.

supercow_power.name: Supercow Power
supercow_power.desc: Makes the Pokete angry and strong.

poison_thorn.name: Poison Thorn
poison_thorn.desc: Stabs a venomous thorn into the enemy's flesh.

pepple_fire.name: Pebble Fire
pepple_fire.desc: Fires pebbles at the enemy and makes it blind.

sand_throw.name: Sand Throw
sand_throw.desc: Throws sand at the enemy and makes it blind.

brick_throw.name: Brick Throw
brick_throw.desc: Throws an Euler brick at the enemy.

stone_crush.name: Stone crush
stone_crush.desc: Crushes the enemy between two heavy stones.

rock_smash.name: Rock Smash
rock_smash.desc: Pounds the enemy with the Pokete's full weight.

dia_stab.name: Dia Stab
dia_stab.desc: Stabs the enemy with a giant diamond spike.

dazzle.name: Dazzle
dazzle.desc: Shines a bright light at the enemy and dazzles them.

dia_spikes.name: Dia spikes
dia_spikes.desc: Throws a heck of a lot of diamond spikes at the enemy.

earch_quake.name: Earthquake
earch_quake.desc: Moves the ground with tremendous force.

ground_hit.name: Ground Hit
ground_hit.desc: Damages the enemy with an unpredictable hit out of the ground.

dick_energy.name: Dick Energy
dick_energy.desc: Collects a great amount of energy in the Pokete's tip.

hiding.name: Hiding
hiding.desc: Makes the Pokete hide under the ground to minimize damage.

webattack.name: Web attack
webattack.desc: Thows web towards enemy in order to immobilize.

fire_bite.name: Fire Bite
fire_bite.desc: Burns and bites the enemy at the same time.

ash_throw.name: Ash Throw
ash_throw.desc: Throws ashes in the enemy's eyes.

fire_ball.name: Fire Ball
fire_ball.desc: Casts a fireball at the enemy.

flying.name: Flying
flying.desc: Gives the Pokete the ability to fly you around.

pick.name: Peck
pick.desc: A peck at the enemy's weakest spot.

wind_blow.name: Wind Blow
wind_blow.desc: Casts a gust of wind at the enemy.

storm_gust.name: Storm Gale
storm_gust.desc: Casts a vicious and violent storm full of rain and hail, hitting the enemy in its weakest spots and makes it want to die.

eye_pick.name: Eye Peck
eye_pick.desc: Pecks at one of the enemy's eyes.

wing_hit.name: Wing Hit
wing_hit.desc: Hits the enemy with a wing.

power_pick.name: Power Peck
power_pick.desc: A harsh pecking on the enemy's head.

bubble_gun.name: Bubble Gun
bubble_gun.desc: Fires some bubbles at the enemy.

bubble_shield.name: Bubble Shield
bubble_shield.desc: Creates a giant bubble that protects the Pokete.

wet_slap.name: Wet Slap
wet_slap.desc: Gives the enemy a cold and wet slap in the face.

shell_pinch.name: Shell Pinch
shell_pinch.desc: Pinches the enemy with its strong shell.

heart_touch.name: Heart Touch
heart_touch.desc: Touches the enemy's heart with cold, ghostly claws.

mind_blow.name: Mind Blow
mind_blow.desc: Causes confusion deep in the enemy's mind.

mega_arch.name: Mega Arch
mega_arch.desc: Gives the enemy a massive shock.

special_smell.name: Special Smell
special_smell.desc: Spreads a special smell that will make the enemy confused but very happy.

apple_drop.name: Apple Drop
apple_drop.desc: Makes an apple drop on the enemy's head.

encouragement.name: Encouragement
encouragement.desc: Encourages and strengthens all Poketes in your team.

super_sucker.name: Super Sucker
super_sucker.desc: Sucks 2 HP from the enemy and adds to its own.

sucker.name: Sucker
sucker.desc: Sucks 1 HP from the enemy and adds to its own.

root_strangler.name: Root Strangler
root_strangler.desc: Uses old and crusty roots to strangle the enemy.

root_slap.name: Root Slap
root_slap.desc: Uses old and crusty roots to slap the enemy.

the_old_roots_hit.name: The Old Roots Hit
the_old_roots_hit.desc: An ancient attack that summons the deepest and oldest roots from deep in the earth to defeat the enemy.

leaf_storm.name: Leaf Storm
leaf_storm.desc: Blasts a bunch of spiky leaves at the enemy.

bark_hardening.name: Bark Hardening
bark_hardening.desc: Hardens its outer layers to protect itself.

poison_spores.name: Poison Spores
poison_spores.desc: Ejects some poisonous spores onto the enemy.

branch_stab.name: Branch Stab
branch_stab.desc: Stabs the enemy with a branch, preferably in the enemy's eyes.

snow_storm.name: Snow Storm
snow_storm.desc: Summons a snow storm full of ice spikes onto the enemy.

sword_of_ice.name: Sword of Ice
sword_of_ice.desc: Stabs a giant ice spike into the enemy.

spikes.name: Spikes
spikes.desc: Stabs the enemy with some small ice spikes.

sweet_smell.name: Sweet smell
sweet_smell.desc: Unleashes a sweet scent that's turning heads and minds alike.

thunderstorm.info: There is a thunderstorm going on!

catch_em_all.title: Catch em all
catch_em_all.desc: Catch all Poketes and fill your Pokete-Dex!
